instance, the arms of star polymers) then the structural changes of the polymer shape would be negligible and our

Despite the differences between ABP and AOUP models, a connection line between them has been already
. We remark that AOUP has been originally introduced as a simplification of ABP in order to cap-
ture its phenomenology with the aim of making analytical predictions
